plot: Johnnie loves his train (&"The General&") and Annabelle Lee. When the Civil War begins he is turned down for service because he's more valuable as an engineer. Annabelle thinks it's because he's a coward. Union spies capture The General with Annabelle on board. Johnny must rescue both his loves.   Written by  Ed Stephan
title: El maquinista de la general
plot_es: Johnnie loves his train (&"The General&") and Annabelle Lee. When the Civil War begins he is turned down for service because he's more valuable as an engineer. write.role: book &"Daring and Suffering: a History of the Great Railroad Adventure&" (uncredited)
write.name: William Pittenger
